description: We filmed this last summer on a warm day when Joe was feeling quite experimental! He seemed relaxed about showing off in his first shoot and agreed to have a play on camera with a dildo and in the end he did hardly did anything allowing another lad to wank him off and stuff a vibrating toy up his hole! A great bonus shoot we are adding so you get the chance to see Joe playing like never before.
title: Straight Young Pup Joe Gets his First Manhandling & Dildoed all at Once!
